title: Life of Pi (2012) BluRay Rip 720p [Hindi Dubbed]
description:
I started this movie expecting that Indian people speak their language but hey, everyone speak bad English! This seriously make me to puke: Movie happenings is set to completely NO English speaking country but (hey miracle!) everyone speak English. What tha fuck!

 I stop it after 20+ minutes disguised by ignorance of directors that will do anything to go inside of an American and British asses.

 So...
 This is like it should be: Indian Hindu language.

 Just enjoy in different culture beautiful movie, not deformed by English that doesn't belong here.
 -It is like you watch some awesome Asian movie where everyone speak English. How disguising and arrogant this can be..

 Enjoy and please, seed and comment if you like
